name: nde
description: The IDE of the future, today!

scripts.build: cd .. && rm -f index.html indexjson.js service-worker.js now.json && npx browserfs nde/index.json && cp nde/service-worker.js . && cp nde/first-time-install.html index.html && echo global.XmlHttpRequestIndexJSON = > indexjson.js && cat nde/index.json >> indexjson.js
scripts.now: cd .. && cp nde/now.json . && now && now alias

author: William Hilton <wmhilton@gmail.com>
